h1.content: display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; color: #fff; background: #FFB74D; padding: 5px 20px; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: 2px 2px 0px #F57C00;

h2.content: display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; color: #4FC3F7; border-bottom: 3px dashed #4FC3F7; padding-bottom: 4px;

h3.content: font-weight: bold; color: #FF8A65; padding-left: 10px; border-left: 5px solid #FF8A65; border-radius: 4px;

code.block: color: #5D4037; background: #FFF3E0; border-radius: 12px; border: 2px solid #FFE0B2; margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap;
code.inline: background: #E1F5FE; padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 12px; color: #0288D1; font-size: 14px; border: none;

styles.quote: border: 2px dashed #FFB74D; border-radius: 12px; padding: 15px; background: #FFFDE7; margin: 0.8em 0; color: #F57C00; font-style: normal; word-wrap: break-word;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block; border-radius: 12px; border: 4px solid #B2EBF2;
styles.link: color: #29B6F6; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 2px dotted #29B6F6; font-weight: bold;

emphasis.strong: font-weight: bold; color: #FF7043; background: url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100" preserveAspectRatio="none"><path d="M0 90 Q 50 100 100 90" stroke="%23FFCCBC" stroke-width="10" fill="none"/></svg>') bottom repeat-x; background-size: 100% 10px;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 0; border: 2px solid #FFCC80; border-radius: 8px; overflow: hidden;
table.header: background: #FFF3E0; font-weight: bold; color: #E65100; border-bottom: 2px solid #FFCC80; font-size: 1em;
